00001 package modules.taskModule.entityDefinitions;
00002 
00003 import java.util.Vector;
00004 
00005 import newtonERP.module.AbstractOrmEntity;
00006 import newtonERP.orm.associations.AccessorManager;
00007 import newtonERP.orm.associations.PluralAccessor;
00008 import newtonERP.orm.field.Field;
00009 import newtonERP.orm.field.Fields;
00010 import newtonERP.orm.field.type.FieldInt;
00011 import newtonERP.orm.field.type.FieldText;
00012 
00017 public class SearchEntity extends AbstractOrmEntity
00018 {
00021         public SearchEntity()
00022         {
00023                 super();
00024                 setVisibleName("Entité de recherche");
00025                 AccessorManager.addAccessor(this, new EntityEntity());
00026         }
00027 
00028         @Override
00029         public Fields initFields()
00030         {
00031                 Vector<Field<?>> fieldList = new Vector<Field<?>>();
00032                 fieldList.add(new FieldInt("Numéro", getPrimaryKeyName()));
00033                 fieldList.add(new FieldText("Description", "name", false));
00034                 fieldList.add(new FieldInt("Entité", new EntityEntity()
00035                                 .getForeignKeyName()));
00036                 return new Fields(fieldList);
00037         }
00038 
00042         public AbstractOrmEntity getEntity()
00043         {
00044                 EntityEntity entityEntity = (EntityEntity) getSingleAccessor(new EntityEntity()
00045                                 .getForeignKeyName());
00046 
00047                 AbstractOrmEntity entity = entityEntity.getEntityDefinition();
00048 
00049                 Vector<SearchCriteria> searchCriteriaList = getSearchCriteriaList();
00050 
00051                 for (SearchCriteria searchCriteria : searchCriteriaList)
00052                         addSearchCriteria(entity, searchCriteria);
00053 
00054                 return entity;
00055         }
00056 
00057         private Vector<SearchCriteria> getSearchCriteriaList()
00058         {
00059                 PluralAccessor searchCriteriaList = getPluralAccessor("SearchCriteria");
00060                 Vector<SearchCriteria> searchCriteriaVector = new Vector<SearchCriteria>();
00061                 for (AbstractOrmEntity entity : searchCriteriaList)
00062                         searchCriteriaVector.add((SearchCriteria) entity);
00063                 return searchCriteriaVector;
00064         }
00065 
00066         private void addSearchCriteria(AbstractOrmEntity entity,
00067                         SearchCriteria searchCriteria)
00068         {
00069                 String key = searchCriteria.getKey();
00070                 String value = searchCriteria.getValue();
00071                 String operator = searchCriteria.getOperator();
00072                 entity.setData(key, value);
00073                 entity.getFields().getField(key).setOperator(operator);
00074         }
00075 }
